4442.title: This service provides archives of their terms of service so that changes can be viewed over time

tosdr.case: This service provides archives of their Terms of Service so that changes can be viewed over time
tosdr.tldr: Whole ToS and Rules history can be found via the source link.

4572.quoteText:
<li>Keeping your account secure is your responsibility.
"I was hacked" and "It was my friend/brother" are not excuses.
4572.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

4574.quoteText: <b>Discussion or distribution of illegal content is not permitted in any form.
4574.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

tosdr.case: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

4576.quoteText: If however your account name contains personally identifiable information, then you may be granted one name change, again at our discretion.
4576.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

tosdr.case: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

4577.quoteText:
Standard cookies we set

These are the main cookies we set during normal operation of the software.

  • xf_session
    • Stores the current ID of your session.
  • xf_user
    • Stores a key, unique to you, which allows us to keep you logged in to the software as you navigate from page to page.
4577.title: The service provides a complete list of all cookies set by its website

tosdr.case: The service provides a complete list of all cookies set by its website

4591.quoteText: Creation of multiple accounts is not permitted.
4591.title: Service does not allow alternative accounts

tosdr.case: Service does not allow alternative accounts

4729.quoteText:
Racism, sexism, or other forms of bigotry are strictly prohibited.
  1. Do not use racial slurs or bigoted remarks (e.g. concerning English abilities or choice of programming language) towards other users.
  • Any form of trolling, flaming, flame-baiting, or being overly aggressive towards other users it not permitted.
    1. Keep discussion civil. Do not harass or threaten other users, or use SpigotMC as a place to coordinate attacks on others.
4729.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

tosdr.case: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

4730.quoteText:
Content of an adult or sexual nature is strictly prohibited.
  1. The general guideline for this is that content must be "PG-13" or below.
4730.title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content

tosdr.case: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content

4732.quoteText: Do not access the forums via automated mechanisms.
4732.title: no spidering or crawling

tosdr.case: Spidering or crawling is not allowed

4735.quoteText: We provide additional mechanisms such as "two factor authentication" to help you with this.
4735.title: The service provides two factor authentification for your account

tosdr.case: The service provides two factor authentification for your account

4736.quoteText:
Removing/disabling cookies

Managing your cookies and cookie preferences must be done from within your browser's options/preferences. Here is a list of guides on how to do this for popular browser software:

  • Microsoft Internet Explorer
  • Microsoft Edge
  • Mozilla Firefox
  • Google Chrome
  • Safari for macOS
  • Safari for iOS
4736.title: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

tosdr.case: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

4737.quoteText: Other cookies may be set by third party service providers which may provide information such as tracking anonymously which users are visiting the site, or set by content embedded into some pages, such as YouTube or other media service providers.
4737.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

4740.quoteText: Accounts may not be sold without specific permission from SpigotMC. If there is any indication you are attempting to, or have sold your account it will be permanently banned.
4740.title: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties

tosdr.case: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties

4741.title: The terms for this service are easy to read

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read
tosdr.tldr: Very short and clear ToS / Rules which allow for fast and easy reading.

4743.title: You can choose the copyright license

tosdr.case: You can choose the copyright license
tosdr.tldr: As Spigot is a forum and marketplace you can choose the copyright license you want to publish your software with. Open-Source projects are handled just like closed-source ones.

4744.title: User feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.

tosdr.case: User feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.
tosdr.tldr: You can freely discuss changes in the feedback and suggestions forum section (link is in source).

4745.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms
tosdr.tldr: See the source link in the lower left corner at the end of the terms.

4746.quoteText: We currently do not offer website functionality for you to opt out of any “do not track” signals or listings.
4746.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
